name: Colour Cave Clash!
description:
Welcome to Colour Cave!

In this game you will race to the end of a cave using only 3 given colours which allow you to move at different speeds. Red moves you 1 space, blue moves you 3 and yellow moves you 5. But watch out, if the opponent also picks one of the colours you have chosen then neither of you are able to move. (Is what I would say If I were able to get that mechanic working 100% of the time) 

Use the arrow keys to swap between colours and the enter key to select them!

(And just to note; If a character starts to bob up and down then restart the game because they won't move again)
